detailsData.title: Exclusive Representation
detailsData.content: Chopra & Nocerino, LLP is the exclusive personal injury law firm of the New York Mets, showcasing their high-profile clientele and specialized legal services.

detailsData.title: Multilingual Services
detailsData.content: To better serve a diverse clientele, the firm offers services in both English and Spanish, ensuring effective communication and understanding for all clients.

detailsData.title: No Fee Unless You Win
detailsData.content: Clients are not charged upfront fees, and the firm only gets paid if they win your case, aligning their success with the client's financial recovery.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Practice Areas
detailsData.content: With a wide range of practice areas including car accidents, construction accidents, and wrongful death claims, the firm is equipped to handle a variety of personal injury cases.

address: 100 Quentin Roosevelt Blvd. #107, Garden City, NY 11530
subHeading: In 2020 & 2022, Chopra & Nocerino Had The Most Top 50 Settlements of any Law Firm in New York
valueProp: When you work with our talented and compassionate team of New York personal injury lawyers, you will never be just another case to us. No matter what you are facing in the aftermath of your accident, the skilled personal injury team at Chopra & Nocerino, LLP, is here to help. You can count on us to be your dedicated advocates and to treat you like family throughout the life of your case and beyond. New York is our home, and we proudly serve our community by providing excellent legal representation to injury victims throughout New York and the surrounding area. We also happen to be the exclusive personal injury law firm of the New York Mets—just another way we show our love for this great city.
